Dr. Memory
Installing on Linux

This package contains a local Dr. Memory install that can be executed directly from the drmemory/bin directory, or by using DynamoRIO's drrun with the -t drmemory or -t drmemory_light tool flags. The instructions below cover installing a separate local install using a standalone Dr. Memory package.

Installing

Download the .tar.gz version of Dr. Memory. Untar the package into a directory of your choice:

tar xzf DrMemory-Linux-X.X.X-X.tar.gz

Now either place the bin subdirectory of the Dr. Memory directory structure on your PATH, or invoke Dr. Memory via its full path.
